reviewText:
Thank you Cher for getting me through hours on the treadmill after 8 leg surgeries.
Well worth it.
So fun!
More than a concert, like live theater
Well of course
It's Cher!!!

This product far exceeded my expections. I purchased this for my husband because he had tickets for The Farwell Tour in our area but Cher had to cancel due to illness. He has watched this over and over and can't get enough
